external_games.name: Fairy Kitty no Kaiun Jiten: Yousei no Kuni no Uranai Shugyou
Fairy Kitty no Kaiun Jiten: Yousei no Kuni no Uranai Shugyou

name: Fairy Kitty no Kaiun Jiten: Yousei no Kuni no Uranai Shugyou
storyline:
The game includes two main modes, Read Fortune and Study. When playing the game, the player can enter their details such as full name and date of birth. The Read Fortune mode features an elaborate fortune telling system for oneself or a friend.

The Study mode allows the player to play various minigames, including a game where the player has to flip cards with certain runes on them and avoid matching the rune shown on the left hand side of the screen and another in which the player has to jump across stepping stones without falling in the water.
summary: A Hello Kitty game for the Game Boy Color.
